Params: {3: 'Summer in Aomizu on this island is a poem composed by the chirping of cicadas.'}
{3: 'Under the serene sky with rosy clouds, a warn breeze gently touches the town.'}
{3: "You stand on the plaza near the beach, waiting for Babylonia's transport craft."}
{3: 'Not long ago, you accepted a mission and came here to help with the reconstruction of a conservation area called Aomizu.'}
{3: "Lucia, Lee, and Liv didn't follow. They're still back at Babylonia."}
{3: 'Yesterday, you received a comms message saying that Karenina will come today as a representative from the Engineering Force.'}
{3: 'It all goes back to the mission the day before yesterday.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "You must be exhausted lately. I guess you haven't had a proper rest for a while.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Our mission this time is pretty easy. Judging from the schedule, you can take four or five days off if you complete the mission on time.', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's great.", 3: '27', 4: 'I have this feeling that... the vacation is going to end in a bad way.', 5: '30', 6: 'Summer is finally here.', 7: '35'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Don't get too relaxed. We have missions to finish before that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I've had this question on my mind for a long time: Why unexpected things always happen around you?", 4: '1'}
{2: "I've been wondering about that question for years...", 3: '36'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Beaches are where young people should go in summer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'The location is a conservation area called "Aomizu" on an island.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'This area is in dire need of reconstruction in many places.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Your mission is to help with the reconstruction of the area and provide guidance to the local armed defense forces.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'The overall difficulty is not high. Celica will walk you through the details.', 4: '1'}
{3: "President Hassen's voice is drowned by the noise of propeller cutting through the air."}
{3: 'A transport craft comes from a distance and lands slowly on the plaza.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, you notice that something is off.'}
{2: "The model of this transport craft. It's not Babylonia's, is it?", 3: '62'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The hatch opens. An unexpected figure appears.'}
{3: 'The energetic voice has revealed the identity of the speaker.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Nanami is standing triumphantly at the hatch with her hands on her hips. Behind her is Haicma and some mechanoids.'}
{3: 'Nanami runs toward you in an extremely fast speed from the transport craft.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I feel it's been ages since we last met, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I sneaked a peek at Celica's mission schedule and know that Commandant will be here, so I came over as well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Such a rare summer vacation, and Commandant didn't even think of Nanami!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm sure there will be many activities since this is a seaside vacation!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The sea, the beach, the spring, and the test of courage! I've got so many things to do!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami speaks so fast that no one can keep up.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Commandant's really got a lot to do.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Then I'll go find a hotel. Don't slack off, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She then walks off toward the town with the mechanoids.'}
{3: 'Haicma walks over to Nanami, exchanges a few words, and walks up to you.'}
{2: 'It really has been a while, Haicma.', 3: '124'}
{3: 'You point at the mechanoids, asking Haicma about who they are.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'They are guys from the Church of Machina.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Haicma confirmed your guess. After all, there are some familiar figures.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Nanami said this is a "team building" activity.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Nanami sprints back from a distance, kicking up a cloud of dust behind her.'}
{3: 'She jumps up and darts into your embrace with open arms.'}
{3: "The powerful impact sends you sprawling backward, but thanks to Nanami's perfect control over her power, it doesn't hurt."}
{2: 'That is... a whole lot of love.', 3: '166', 4: 'Th-Thank you...', 5: '166'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm passing on sunny energy to Commandant.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Now you have the energy to work.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Let's have a good celebration after work. I will prepare a big cake for you.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In the distance, Cervantes gently tips his hat. You return the gesture with a nod.'}
{1: '1', 3: "It's just that a female mechanoid with black and white hair is giving you a weird look."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Zavier hits the female mechanoid hard on her head. You could almost see stars circling above her head.'}
{3: 'He then holds the mechanoid by her neck and walks off into the distance.'}
{2: 'Zavier', 3: 'Stop thinking about those things while you are on vacation.', 4: '3'}
{3: "The female mechanoid's body starts to play music. It seems there's a music module in her body."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amina', 3: 'The sea and the beach would mean... swimsuits, surfboards, and swim rings...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amina', 3: 'I guess anyone could make a fortune running a swimming equipment company here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As you look at their backs in the distance, a thought emerges in your mind—'}
{3: 'The Church of Machina really is full of talents.'}
{3: 'The sound of the transport craft comes again from a distance.'}
{3: 'The transport craft lands, and the hatch door opens.'}
{2: "I didn't expect to see you here.", 3: '244', 4: 'Pulao? What brings you here?', 5: '244'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'My popularity radar detected a long absence of me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'If this continues, I will gradually lose my influence and popularity.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Even the Kowloong idol is ending up sleeping on the streets...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Pulao has to be number one on the popularity leaderboard!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'It feels like the conversation is getting weird.', 3: '253'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Haha, it's actually a summer heat bonus vacation.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Lady Qu specially picked this vacation spot to thank us for our hard work.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Just asked about where you are after the remote meeting with Hassen.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Qu walks slowly out of the transport craft, accompanied by Hanying, Chaofeng, Yazi and other guys.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "I've learned from the church that you're here as well.", 4: '4'}
{3: 'The peaceful summer day is starting to get noisy.'}
{3: "But, in a way, it's also a proof of vigor and life."}
{3: 'Another transport craft comes after you sent the second group of guests away.'}
{3: 'Karenina appears at the hatch of the transport craft.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Um... The Engineering Force seems to have a bit of a problem. I've gotta go. You guys can carry on without me.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Wait. Aren't you supposed to be in Babylonia?", 3: '308'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lee and Liv took some of my work. We were a bit worried about you, so I came here to help you with the mission in the conservation area.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I submitted an application to President Hassen. I was two hours late but managed to catch Karenina's transport craft.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We decided to give you a surprise.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Breeze comes from the sea, bringing a touch of warmth.'}
{3: 'Summer will come again, but it will never be this clear, blue, and heartwarming.'}
{2: 'Yeah. Looks like we can finish everything today.', 3: '343'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "There's going to be a summer celebration in the conservation area. How about we go together?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "The terminal beeps just in time. You have a bad feeling seeing it's from Celica."}
{2: 'What is it?', 3: '353', 4: "Fingers crossed it's not any urgent task.", 5: '353'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "I hate to bother you during the vacation, but unfortunately, we've got some urgent tasks.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'There are two tasks. One at the Aomizu Private School.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "The other... Let me check... is about the optimization of the conservation area's defenses.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "I've sent the briefs to your terminal. Feel free to contact me if you need any help. I will explain in detail.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Then I'll leave you to your work.", 4: '11'}
{3: 'Celica rushes through her words and terminates the call in a hurry.'}
{2: '...Looks like I have to work overtime.', 3: '367'}
{3: 'You open the mailbox and see two briefs.'}
{2: '(Select the Aomizu Private School mission)', 3: '370', 4: '(Select the conservation area defenses optimization mission)', 5: '370'}
